item.title: Puppeteer - No Strings Attached
item.description: I am a Co-Manager for Google Developer Group - Singapore (FB). And today was our annual GDG-SG DevFest 2017 event. Apart from being an organizer, I was also a speaker. I gave a short talk on Puppeteer. This post is (almost) a transcript of my speech today. Slides can be found here
